timeline.message:
Update registerBtcTransfer signature

- Update BridgeMethods and Bridge classes to cast BTC addresses as bytes
- Update tests

Update registerBtcTransfer signature

- Update BridgeMethods and Bridge classes to cast BTC addresses as bytes
- Update tests

Update registerBtcTransfer signature

- Update BridgeMethods and Bridge classes to cast BTC addresses as bytes
- Update tests

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if it makes a difference, but you could use bytes20 as the data type for btc addresses since they are always 20 bytes long
timeline.author: marcos-iov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -580,7 +580,7 @@
     REGISTER_BTC_TRANSFER(
             CallTransaction.Function.fromSignature(
                     "registerBtcTransfer",
-                    new String[]{"bytes", "uint256", "bytes", "bytes32", "string", "string", "string", "bool"},
+                    new String[]{"bytes", "uint256", "bytes", "bytes32", "bytes", "string", "bytes", "bool"},
